segments.text: Did you hear how cold it got last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard the radio announcer say it was 18 degrees below zero .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was so cold this morning . I could hardly start my car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My car didn't want to start either at first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not in the new apartment . We have to leave the car in the parking lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much antifreeze did you put in your new car then ? You must have to keep it well below zero .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do . Right now I have it protected up to 30 below zero .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does it ever get that cold on here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . It sometimes gets to 20 below .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Speaking of cold , how about going for a cup of coffee to warm up .
segments.speaker: S1
